name: Invoke-Obfuscation CLIP+ Launcher
description: Detects Obfuscated use of Clip.exe to execute PowerShell
query: (winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.provider_name:/[Mm][Ii][Cc][Rr][Oo][Ss][Oo][Ff][Tt]\-[Ww][Ii][Nn][Dd][Oo][Ww][Ss]\-[Ss][Ee][Cc][Uu][Rr][Ii][Tt][Yy]\-[Aa][Uu][Dd][Ii][Tt][Ii][Nn][Gg]/ AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Cc][Mm][Dd].*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*\&\&.*/ AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:/.*[Cc][Ll][Ii][Pp][Bb][Oo][Aa][Rr][Dd]\]\:\:.*/)
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Security AND winlog.provider_name:Microsoft\-Windows\-Security\-Auditing AND event.code:4697 AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*cmd* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*\&&* AND winlog.event_data.ServiceFileName:*clipboard\]\:\:*)`
